q1.name: Back-to-School
q1.description: Meet the EBHS staff of the 2022-2023 school year to find out what is in store for the upcoming school year.

q1.name: Homecoming Dance
q1.description: Enjoy dancing, food, and fun time with friends at the annual Homecoming Dance!

q1.name: Homecoming Football Game
q1.description: Come cheer on our Bears against the Piscataway High School Chiefs!

q1.name: Fall Season Pep Rally
q1.description: Watch and support our distinguished school athletes of the Fall sports season.

q2.name: Bubble Tea Night
q2.description: Watch performances, participate in ramen eating contests, and of course, enjoy the bubble tea!

q2.name: Volleyball Tournament
q2.description: Come watch as our participants from all grades form teams to compete in an elimination tournament to see who is the best at volleyball!

q2.name: Christmas Caroling
q2.description: Join members of the EBHS choir to help spread holiday cheer among all the classrooms!

q2.name: Winter Season Pep Rally
q2.description: Watch and support our distinguished school athletes of the Winter sports season.

q3.name: Quiz Bowl Night
q3.description: Play in a buzzer-style competition hosted by the EBHS Academic Team, with questions in math, science, literature, history, pop culture, and so much more!

q3.name: Collision
q3.description: Come see our students and staff perform in the biggest talent show of the year!

q3.name: Badminton Tournament
q3.description: Come watch as our participants from all grades form duos to compete in an elimination tournament to see who is the best at badminton!

q3.name: Science Fair Night
q3.description: Explore different fields of science and get a glimpse into the careers of scientists from all different backgrounds

q4.name: Masquerade Ball
q4.description: Come dressed up with masks and celebrate with all of our world language honor societies! Food and drinks provided.

q4.name: Ping Pong Tournament
q4.description: Come watch as our participants from all grades form duos to compete in an elimination tournament to see who is the best at ping-pong!

q4.name: Sprng Season Pep Rally
q4.description: Watch and support our distinguished school athletes of the Winter sports season

q4.name: Prom
q4.description: Enjoy dancing, food, and fun time with friends at the annual Prom Dance!
